issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: I need to re-login after using IDE for a while, it's very annoying.
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio: Need to re-login after using for a while

comments.body:
When user remains idle using Appcelerator Studio for a long time, then the current session can expire. When expired session detected by studio, user gets prompted for re-login.



*Test Environments:*

CLI Version :4.1.3
Titanium SDK  Version:4.1.1.GA
Appc Studio: Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.1.1.201507141126
Alloy: 1.7.6
Mac OS X,Version                     = 10.10.1

Thanks
